synopsis.text: After receiving a tip about a mansion serving as a front for an arms dealer ring, BSAA captain Chris Redfield finds himself face-to-face with notorious criminal Glenn Arias. Meanwhile, former S.T.A.R.S. member and current professor Rebecca Chambers investigates a series of bizarre incidents involving the dead returning to life. Her research leads her to discover a new virus causing the chaos, and she develops a cure. When an unknown assailant attacks her lab, Chris and his team come to her rescue. Seeking the expertise of Leon S. Kennedy, a member of the DSO, they reunite to stop Arias' bioterrorism plot to unleash the deadly virus on New York City and save humanity from impending doom.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
